EmailTemplate.name: ENSI Materials received - confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: ENSI Workshop materials for {!Job__c.Account_Name__c} program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Job__c.NAM_Name__c}
For the program on {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c} could you please confirm you have received the materials ({!Job__c.Materials_delivery_number_of_boxes__c} Box).
The shipment was delivered on XX and signed for by XX.
Kind regards
